data.comment: The match has started, with Cardiff kicking-off.
The match has started, with Cardiff kicking-off.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Barnsley with the kick-off.
Will Vaulks scores to make it 0-1 at Oakwell Ground.
Goal! Callum Paterson extends Cardiff's lead to 0-2.
Elliot Simoes is replacing Jacob Brown for the home team.
Marlon Pack is replacing Joe Ralls for Cardiff at Oakwell Ground.
Barnsley make their second substitution with Patrick Schmidt replacing Conor Chaplin.
Neil Harris is making the team's second substitution at Oakwell Ground with Josh Murphy replacing Junior Hoilett.
Robert Glatzel is on a sub for Callum Paterson for Cardiff.
That's full-time at Oakwell Ground. The final score is 0-2.
